response.overview: George, manager of a branch of a large American company, is a big, incorrigible womanizer. When the General Manager of America announces that he will come for an inspection, George is a little confused, because the General wants to stay in his home, in a family environment and not in a hotel. But the good boy knows another path. George rents a beautiful manuli and christens it his wife. Wedding photos and other hilarious tricks are put into action to fool Mr. General.
response.title: Pantrepste me ki as klaio
